title: Hamam (Hamamköy)
description: Hamam is a modern Turkish village near Erzurum in the Northeast of Turkey. Here an inscription of the Urartian king Argišti I, son of Minua (eighth century BCE), was found which reports the filling of a grain silo.

properties.description: Location of a modern associated location based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Erzurum
